means: 一种夜鹰科之鸟（产于美国南部及中部）

sentence.Network_en: There is little evidence to support many of Mr Will's cheerful assumptions.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有多少证据能支持威尔先生的那些乐观设想。

sentence.Network_en: Don't chuck yesterday's paper out. I still haven't done the crossword.
sentence.Network_cn: 别扔了昨天的报纸. 我还没做字谜游戏呢.

sentence.Network_en: I did not really object to Will's behaviour so much as his personality.
sentence.Network_cn: 我与其说是反感威尔的行为，不如说是讨厌他的为人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: chuck-full 充满的chuck-will's-widow 一种夜鹰科之鸟chucker 投掷者
卡罗琳夜鹰(chuck-will's-widow)、帕乌拉凯夜鹰(pauraque)、弱夜鹰(poorwill)、三声夜鹰(whippoorwill)是北美洲的亲缘种。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: imitative of its call

means.word_mean: 1. large whippoorwill-like bird of the southern United States
